\u00b7        Top Investment Firm looking for someone to own their data/analytics function

\u00b7        Work with 2 founders and CTO on build out, data strategy

\u00b7        Analyze large amounts of information to discover trends and patterns

\u00b7        Build predictive models and machine-learning algorithms

\u00b7        Communicate analytic solutions to stakeholders and implement improvements as needed to operational systems

\u00b7        Execute analytical data to help make better investment decisions

\u00b7        Utilize algorithms and models to mine big data stores, perform data and error analysis to improve models

\u00b7        Experience or interest with analytics and modeling, machine learning methods, and programming
